review: Well worth the cost.  My wife and I enjoy watching free Prime movies.

review: a surprise. blazing fast . Petty voice search not covering other services.I wish it could have supported FOX & CNN applications ! that would have made this thing perfect.

review: Love love love this.  Easy to use-don't have to find hubby to watch a show.  Good selection of shows.  Easy to set up.  Ended a lot of frustration-love when Amazon makes products like this.  That's why I keep my Amazon Prime-lots of benefits with tv shows, shipping, etc....
author: Jan Caise

review: didn't have as much prime content as I expected it would.
